identity.description:
Automatically discover and load tools from a TxAgent MCP Server, registering them or providing configurations.

Automatically discover and load all tools from TxAgent MCP Server. Can register discovered tools as individual ToolUniverse tools or provide tool configurations.
capabilities: Discover tools from TxAgent MCP Server
Register tools as individual ToolUniverse tools

server_url.description: URL of the TxAgent MCP Server

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
